title: Can I Appeal Against LeaverBuster 20 min Low Priority Queue?
body:
So I was playing a game and got disconnected due to the phone I'm using as a hotspot dying. 

I managed to revive and return to the game, unfortunately we lost as a result of the 10 min dc.

LeaverBuster picked up on my dc, and punished me, I was wondering if it were possible to appeal this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Leaverbuster penalties cannot be altered or removed as the system is designed in such a way to prevent external taint.

Sorry but I don't think you can appeal for that, I would understand if like the server went down and you and a couple of others in your game dc for 10 mins and then get leave busters but since it's your sides (the internet) fault don't think you can do anything sorry man.

I understand I get penalised because of frequent leaving and unfortunately that's true, I've had to leave some games (2) in recent times due to unexpected events and someone else using my account ragequitting on it, I am pleading for mercy with this one, especially since I came back and helped keep us in the game despite the unfortunate loss.
